inputs.name: metadatapath
inputs.label: Metadata path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where the meta data can be found

inputs.name: logpath
inputs.label: Log path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where the log files should be written, by default builddirectory\Logs will be used

inputs.name: overriderulefile
inputs.label: Override rule file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the rule file to use for every module

inputs.name: frameworkdirectory
inputs.label: Framework directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder path where the framework can be found (so containing xppbp.exe). Optional for Build VM's, mandatory for hosted agents

inputs.name: referencedirectories
inputs.label: Reference directories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semicolon separated list of reference directories (platform directory, application suite directory,custom modules,...). Mandatory for hosted agents, not needed for Build VM's
